history.proof: intros a b c H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
eqA_trans: Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA
eqA_sym: Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA

Goal:
forall a b c : A, eqA a b -> eqA (plusA a c) (plusA b c)

Premises:
Relation_Definitions.transitive : forall A : Type, Relation_Definitions.relation A -> Prop
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
Module Relation_Definitions := Struct Definition relation : Type -> Type. Definition reflexive : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Definition transitive : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Definition symmetric : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Definition antisymmetric : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Definition equiv : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop. Record preorder (A : Type) (R : relation A) : Prop := Build_preorder { preord_refl : reflexive A R; preord_trans : transitive A R } Definition preord_refl : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), preorder A R -> reflexive A R. Definition preord_trans : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), preorder A R -> transitive A R. Record order (A : Type) (R : relation A) : Prop := Build_order { ord_refl : reflexive A R; ord_trans : transitive A R; ord_antisym : antisymmetric A R } Definition ord_refl : forall
Relation_Definitions.symmetric : forall A : Type, Relation_Definitions.relation A -> Prop
mkCoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), ~ eqA A1 A0 -> Relation_Definitions.reflexive A eqA -> Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA -> Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA -> (forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c)) -> (forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a)) -> (forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d)) ->...-> CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
ssrbool.is_left : {?A} + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- Prop]
Fin.eqb : Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n -> bool where ?m : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- nat]
plusA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c0 d)
plusA_assoc : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c0)) (plusA (plusA a b) c0)
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} eqA_trans := CoefStructure.eqA_trans A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA eqA_sym := CoefStructure.eqA_sym A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs : Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA |- nat]
plusA_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a)
minusA_def : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b))
plusA_A0 : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0)
multA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c0 d)
invA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b)
multA_assoc : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c0)) (multA (multA a b) c0)
multA_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a)
invA_plusA : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a))
divA_is_multA : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b)
multA_A1_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a
multA_dist_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (plusA (multA c0 a) (multA c0 b)) (multA c0 (plusA a b))
divA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 d : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0) (nZd : ~ eqA d A0), eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c0 d nZd)
divA_rew : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : ~ eqA b A0), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2
divA_invA_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0) (nZib : ~ eqA (invA b) A0), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb))
multA_A0_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0
divA_multA_comp_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 : A) (nZc : ~ eqA c0 A0), eqA (divA (multA a b) c0 nZc) (multA (divA a c0 nZc) b)
eqA_A0 : forall a b : A, eqA a A0 -> eqA a b -> eqA b A0
CoefStructure.eqA_sym : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> Relation_Definitions.symmetric A eqA
CoefStructure.eqA_trans : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> Relation_Definitions.transitive A eqA
A1_diff_A0 : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> ~ eqA A1 A0
eqA_ref : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> Relation_Definitions.reflexive A eqA
Znumtheory.Zis_gcd_intro : forall a b g : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.divide g a -> BinInt.Z.divide g b -> (forall x : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.divide x a -> BinInt.Z.divide x b -> BinInt.Z.divide x g) -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b g
BinInt.Z.mod_divide : forall a b : BinNums.Z, b <> BinNums.Z0 -> BinInt.Z.modulo a b = BinNums.Z0 < -> BinInt.Z.divide b a
Znumtheory.Zdivide_dec : forall a b : BinNums.Z, {BinInt.Z.divide a b} + {~ BinInt.Z.divide a b}
Znumtheory.rel_prime_dec : forall a b : BinNums.Z, {Znumtheory.rel_prime a b} + {~ Znumtheory.rel_prime a b}
Inductive Zis_gcd (a b g : BinNums.Z) : Prop := Zis_gcd_intro : BinInt.Z.divide g a -> BinInt.Z.divide g b -> (forall x : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.divide x a -> BinInt.Z.divide x b -> BinInt.Z.divide x g) -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b g Arguments Znumtheory.Zis_gcd (_ _ _)%Z_scope Arguments Znumtheory.Zis_gcd_intro (_ _ _)%Z_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Ascii.ascii_rec : forall P : Ascii.ascii -> Set, (forall b b0 b1 b2 b3 b4 b5 b6 : bool, P (Ascii.Ascii b b0 b1 b2 b3 b4 b5 b6)) -> forall a : Ascii.ascii, P a
Znumtheory.rel_prime = fun a b : BinNums.Z => Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments Znumtheory.rel_prime (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.modulo = fun a b : BinNums.Z => let (_, r) := BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl a b in r : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.modulo (_ _)%Z_scope
List.in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {List.In a l} + {~ List.In a l}
Znumtheory.Zgcd_1_rel_prime : forall a b : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.gcd a b = BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH < -> Znumtheory.rel_prime a b
Relation_Definitions.Build_equivalence : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Relation_Definitions.reflexive A R -> Relation_Definitions.transitive A R -> Relation_Definitions.symmetric A R -> Relation_Definitions.equivalence A R
Ascii.ascii_dec : forall a b : Ascii.ascii, {a = b} + {a <> b}
Sumbool.bool_of_sumbool : forall A B : Prop, {A} + {B} -> {b : bool | if b then A else B}

```coq
intros a b c H.
transitivity b.
- apply plusA_eqA_comp; auto.
- apply eqA_sym. apply plusA_eqA_comp; auto.
Qed.
Qed.```

original: intros a b c H. transitivity b. - apply plusA_eqA_comp; auto. - apply eqA_sym. apply plusA_eqA_comp; auto.
